overview:
Prior to founding RatePoint, Chris was formerly a co-founder and chief technology officer of GeoTrust. At GeoTrust, Chris was responsible for the company’s technology vision and product development activities with strategic partners, evaluating security technologies and market opportunities, and also managing the Company’s advanced technology engineering group. Chris co-founded the company after acquiring technology from Equifax Secure, where Chris was AVP of digital certificate services. While at Equifax, he helped set the company’s strategic direction and manage Equifax Secure’s digital certificate services

Chris holds an M.B.A. in marketing and strategy from Emory University and a B.S. in finance and economics from the University of South Carolina.
